resources.string: Do you want open location settings to enable GPS?
Could not open Android settings. Open them manually to change.
The app may not work because:\n
No measurements so far, go outside and collect some data!
Cannot start collecting because GPS is unavailable.
Upload successful. Thanks for your contribution!
Partially uploaded mean that some data has been successfully sent before upload has been aborted. This may be caused by your request or by an error which has been encountered.
Upload failed due to unknown reason. Please check if you have the latest version of the app. If you encounter this problem for a long time, please let me know.
User with the access token entered in app preferences cannot be found. Please check if entered access token is correct.
Server refused the data send by the app. Please check if you have the latest version of the app. If you encounter this problem for a long time, please let me know.
There is no data to upload. Please collect some measurements before uploading.
Application encountered an error while deleting measurements from your device. Please restart your device and check again. If you still encounter this problem, please let me know.

The server could not be reached because due to network related error which may be caused by missing, too slow or unstable Internet connection. Please check if you have latest application version and try again. If you encounter this problem for a long time, please let me know.

The server returned internal error which may mean that it is overloaded, temporarily unavailable or down for maintenance. Please try again later. If you encounter this problem for a long time, please let me know.
The daily usage limit for the app has been exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.
Cannot upload due to no Internet connection.
The unexpected error occurred. Please send error report to help fixing the problem.
No file types selected for export.
No application to handle the file.
Saving to \"%s\" with current date and time as file name.
The files have been saved to \"%s\".\n\nPlease consider contribution to one of the projects by uploading your measurements!
Select a location to store the files using document picker.
The existing files from the old location will NOT be moved to a new location!
No application to handle the operation.
Make sure you have the original file manager installed and enabled on the system.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete all locally stored data?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete locally stored measurements?
New version of Tower Collector is available
Database upgrade is running. This may take a while.
Shows current GPS status. If you experience problems with getting measurements, please find a location with better signal reception and accuracy.

Your current system date and/or time is invalid comparing to GPS time. Measurements will be saved with correct time but presented statistics may be inaccurate. Please set the date and time in your device.
Battery optimizations are enabled for this app which may result in inaccurate and unreliable measurements being collected.
Please disable battery optimizations in Android settings by selecting \'All Apps\', then Tower Collector: \'Don\'t optimize\'.
Please disable battery optimizations in Android settings by selecting \'All Apps\', then Tower Collector: \'Allow background usage\'.
Battery saver is enabled on the device which may result in inaccurate and unreliable measurements being collected. Please disable battery saver in Android battery settings.
Airplane / flight mode is enabled on your device which blocks the app from collecting measurements. Please disable airplane mode in Android settings.
Number of measurements collected by the application today.
Number of cells collected by the application today. In the parentheses is the number of cells that were collected for the first time on this device, never recorded before.
Number of measurements collected by the application since last upload / deletion.
Number of cells collected (newly discovered) by the application since last upload / deletion.
Number of measurements collected by the application since the beginning.
Number of newly discovered (unique) cells collected by the application since the beginning.
Number of main and neighboring cells to which the phone had access to.
The type of mobile network to which the phone was connected.
The long unique cell tower identifier to which the phone was connected.
For UMTS networks the LCID, also called UTRAN CID, is a concatenation of RNC (ID of the Radio Network Controller) and Cell ID (unique ID of the Cell Tower).
For LTE networks the LCID, also called E-UTRAN CID, is a concatenation of eNodeB (ID of the Radio Network Controller) and Cell ID (unique ID of the Cell Tower).
The unique cell tower identifier and RNC (ID of the Radio Network Controller) to which the phone was connected. This ID is defined only for UMTS and LTE networks.
The unique cell tower identifier to which the phone was connected.
The unique identifier assigned to group of cell towers to which the phone was connected.
The unique identifier of network to which the phone was connected. Together with SID it creates a worldwide unique network identifier.
The unique country code of network operator to which the phone was connected.
The unique identifier of network provider within country to which the phone was connected.
The unique identifier of network system to which the phone was connected. Together with NID it creates a worldwide unique network identifier.

Network signal strength measured while saving expressed in dBm (power ratio in decibels (dB) of the measured power referenced to 1 milliwatt (mW)). Doubling this value means a 10 times stronger signal strength. Values ​​closer to 0 indicate stronger signal.
The geographical latitude of saved position. Positive value ​​represents the northern hemisphere, negative southern. The higher is absolute value the more far it is away from the equator.

The geographical longitude of saved position. Positive value represents a position east of the Prime Meridian, negative west. The higher is absolute value the more far it is away from the Prime Meridian.
Accuracy of the position obtained from GPS.
Date and time when last measurement was saved.
Number of measurements waiting for upload to OpenCellID.org.
Number of measurements waiting for upload to BeaconDB.
Please install web browser to open the page
Upload to all projects is disabled
You have to enter valid access token in Preferences
You have to enter valid custom BeaconDB url in Preferences
Try to upload measurements again if upload fails for one of the projects

This option can break the app\'s configuration and result in crash. In such case you have to clear the app data in Android settings. You need to fully close and reopen the app to see the changes!\n\nYou use it on your own risk!
Measurements collecting settings, GPS parameters, etc.
Everything related to data display, theme, units, etc.
Information about the app, links, contact, etc.
General help, application usage, best practices, integration, etc.
Given value is invalid, restoring default
Restart the app to apply changes.
Restart collector task to apply changes.
Configuration window will be shown before each upload.
If upload fails for one of the projects the app will keep measurements for max 30 days and try to upload them again.
The app will delete uploaded measurements if upload succeed to at least one of the projects.
Measurements will be uploaded to OpenCellID.org.
Measurements will not be uploaded to OpenCellID.org.
The shared access token will be used.
The personal access token will be used.
The token required to upload your measurements.
Entered access token is invalid. The correct format is described in Help.
Register for free on OpenCellID.org website.
Information about access token (API key) and correct formatting.
Measurements will be uploaded to BeaconDB.
Measurements will not be uploaded to BeaconDB.
Measurements will be uploaded to BeaconDB-compatible service defined below.
Measurements will uploaded to official BeaconDB service.
Provide the address to custom server including all required parameters, like: \"https://example.com/geosubmit?optionalParameter=value\"
Entered custom BeaconDB address is invalid.
Values will be presented using imperial units.
Values will be presented using metric system.
Defines color theme of the app.
Defines if screen will be kept constantly on while collecting measurements. Enabling will significantly shorten battery life.
Defines compression format of exported files.
Anonymous usage statistics will be send to help me to improve the app. More info below.
Anonymous usage statistics are disabled. See below what might be send if enabled.
Information about what and why is being shared.
The app will automatically send error reports which help to fix the problem.
The app will ask you for confirmation before sending report which may help to fix the problem.
The app will notify you when new version is available.
Periodical checks for new version availability are disabled.
Presents the app\'s description and version information.
Shows how to use the app and how it is working.
Displays good practices for collecting valuable measurements.
Opens developer\'s website containing description and app stores download links.
Sends an email with your problems, questions and ideas to the developer.
Say thanks and show your support for the app.
Opens GitHub page where you can find the source code, contribute to the app, report issues and share ideas.
Opens Facebook Community page where you can find useful information, links, post ideas and ask questions.
Opens X Community page where you can find useful information, links, post ideas and ask questions.
Opens online tool which allows you to collaborate in translating the app.
Presents information about licenses of used open source components.
Displays information about integration with external applications like Tasker, Automate or Llama.
Defines API version used to get cell info.
Information about differences between API versions.
Defines the logging level of diagnostic messages to the file. Beware that highly detailed logging may slow down the app and create large log files.
Neighboring cells will be collected if available.
Other apps will be notified about collected measurements. More info below.
Notifications to other apps about collected measurements are disabled. More info below.
Information about collected measurements notification to other apps.
Screen will be kept constantly on when app\'s main screen is displayed.
Screen will be controlled by the system when app\'s main screen is displayed.
Collector status bar will be visible.
Collector status bar will be hidden.
About keep screen on when visible
Information how this option works and when to use it.
About keep screen on when collecting
Information how this option works and when to use it.
Notification will be hidden from lock screen and status bar unless expanded. Behavior may vary between devices.
Notification will be visible all the time.
Collecting will be automatically started at app start-up.
The app will not start collecting at start-up.
Collecting will be automatically started at device boot. The app must be installed on internal memory to make it working.

The app will not start collecting at device boot. The app can be installed anywhere. The background location permission must be granted to use this function, otherwise the app will not be able to collect measurements.
Defines what will happen when battery level goes low and collector is running.
Defines the minimum time interval between measurements collection. Set value to 0 to disable.\n[s]
Imports app\'s internal database from measurements.db file located in storage folder set in Preferences.
Exports app\'s internal database to measurements.db file located in storage folder set in Preferences.
Proceeding with this operation may overwrite the existing measurements.db file with current copy which does not contain any measurements.\n\nAre you sure you want to export?
Imports app\'s internal preferences from preferences.xml file located in storage folder set in Preferences.
Exports app\'s internal preferences to preferences.xml file located in storage folder set in Preferences.
Changes the location where application files are stored.
The light theme of the map will always be used.
The map theme will follow the Display preferences.
The map will work only in previously cached areas unless you\'re connected to an unmetered network, typically Wi-Fi.
The map will be updated regardless of the Internet connection type.
Max map zoom level at which measurements are not clustered.
Adjust the map cache size according to available free memory on your device.\n[MB]
Clears map cache folder to free up some space.
Temporarily disabling file logging due to denied storage access.
Location and phone permissions must be granted to collect measurements.
Precise location and phone permissions must be granted to collect measurements.
If you want to use this function be sure to select \'allow all the time\' option for access device\'s location permission!
If you want to use this function be sure to select \'allow in settings\' and then select \'allow all the time\' option for access device\'s location permission!
If you want to use this function you must first grant regular location permissions and then you will be separately asked to grant background location permission!

The app requires the background location permission only if you want to automatically start collecting measurements at device startup. Without this permission you can only start collecting by yourself.
Cancelling measurement collecting due to denied permissions
Measurement collecting is unavailable due to denied location and/or phone permissions
Measurement collecting is unavailable due to denied background location and/or phone permissions
Cancelling measurement collecting due to denied permissions, open the app to grant necessary permissions first
Disabling start at device boot due to denied background location permission.
Notification permission must be granted to ensure application works properly.
The app cannot work properly if notifications are not allowed.
The function is unavailable due to denied notifications permission.
Location permission must be granted to display your location on the map.
The map cannot be enabled due to denied location permission
The map is unavailable due to denied location permission
Upload cancelled due to denied internet permission.
